title: Nidalee winrate plummeted after these QoL nerfs
body:
Q - Javelin Toss
CAST TIME 0.125 seconds ⇒ 0.25 seconds
SPEAR DAMAGE 50/75/100/125/150 ⇒ 50/70/90/110/130
MAXIMUM SPEAR DAMAGE 150/225/300/375/450 ⇒ 150/210/270/330/390
W - Bushwhack
VISION RADIUS ON CAST 1200 for 0.5 seconds ⇒ 400 for 0.5 seconds 

Jungle

https://i.gyazo.com/97867c28829e7275d08ef64313c769fc.png

Mid

https://i.gyazo.com/7631147065200abd1f06c8c042bd71d3.png

The biggest hit IMO was the W vision radius. There's literally 0 reason to use this ability anymore beyond clearing camps because it's damage is useless and it's marking is unreliable at best. In only two or three situations is vision control via trapping really viable because of it's short duration.

On top of this, the Q cast time now just feels unnecessarily clunky. **I'm okay with the damage nerfs.** I just want to be able to see shit when I put a trap for fucking vision. This has been a hallmark for her identity since her initial release and shouldn't have been removed.

https://i.gyazo.com/beef6dcc8816e58963ce1fe46775d0b6.png
